description.value:
Improvements to basic helmets to add advanced vox links and visual augmentations. Common Versions provide the benefits of: Rebreather, Photo-Visor, Vox-Caster, and Microbead. Good Craftsmanship Versions also have Presense Goggles. Poor Versions choose two of the prior options.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
